alert.note: Alert for Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 7:28PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Rooks County through 800 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Zurich, or 18 miles northeast of Ellis, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Plainville and Zurich around 735 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
